items.name: Burning Brazier of Elf
items.description: Upon attacking an enemy, there is a 10% chance to recover 1 MP.

items.name: Book of the Mad
items.description: Every second, own Mana is reduced by 140, but own DMG to enemies is increased by 21%.

items.name: Lightning Flash, Livatis
items.description: Upon a Crit Hit, ATK Spd is increased by 80 and Crit DMG is increased by 20% for 15 sec. Can be stacked up to 5 times max.

items.name: The Seductress, Guillotine
items.description: Upon attacking, there is a 25% chance of dealing 80% of ATK as extra M.DMG, and ATK being increased by 2%. ATK boost can be stacked up to 10 times max.

items.name: Tome of Black Magic
items.description: Every 10 sec, target a single enemy. Said enemy takes DMG that ignores DEF equal to 2.9% of current HP each second for 5 sec, and reduces Mana by 290. This skill is effective only in the Arena.
